sentences.sContent: His cane answered for a baseball bat.
sentences.sContent_eng: His cane answered for a baseball bat.
sentences.sCn: 他的手杖可代用棒球棒。

sentences.sContent: Dick fell for baseball when he was a little boy.
sentences.sContent_eng: Dick fell for baseball when he was a little boy.
sentences.sCn: 当迪克还是个小孩时，他就迷恋上了棒球运动。

sentences.sContent: Balloon, baseball, basketball, football and volleyball all dance  ballet on the  volcano.
sentences.sContent_eng: Balloon, baseball, basketball, football and volleyball all dance ballet on the volcano.
sentences.sCn: 气球、棒球、篮球、足球和排球都在火山上跳芭蕾舞。

trans.tranOther: an outdoor game between two teams of nine players, in which players try to get points by hitting a ball and running around four  base s
